items.title: Bangladesh's BNP wins historic parliamentary election
items.summary: DHAKA, Feb 13 (Reuters) - The Bangladesh Nationalist Party won a ⁠landmark parliamentary election on Friday, a local TV station showed, as ‌ballots were counted in a pivotal vote that is expected to restore political stability in the troubled South Asian country. Read full story

items.title: Judge blocks US military from demoting Mark Kelly over 'illegal orders' video
items.summary: After the retired Navy captain told servicemembers they don't have to obey illegal orders, Defence Secretary Hegseth moved to cut his rank.

items.title: In one swoop, Trump kills US greenhouse gas regulations
items.summary: The Trump administration just eliminated the landmark finding that has underpinned federal regulations on planet-heating pollution since 2009. For nearly the past two decades, the "endangerment finding" has allowed the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) to craft rules limiting greenhouse gas emissions under the Clean Air Act. Rather than repealing those rules individually, the Trump administration […]

items.title: Ever, which says it is the first "AI-native, full-stack" retail marketplace for electric vehicles, raised a $31M Series A led by Eclipse (Sean O'Kane/TechCrunch)
items.summary:
Sean O'Kane / TechCrunch:
Ever, which says it is the first “AI-native, full-stack” retail marketplace for electric vehicles, raised a $31M Series A led by Eclipse  —  If you want to buy or sell a used EV right now, what's the first step you'd take?  —  A startup called Ever wants to be the answer to that question.

items.title: Bangladesh's BNP wins parliamentary election
items.summary: DHAKA, ⁠Feb 13 (Reuters) - The ⁠Bangladesh Nationalist Party ‌crossed the halfway mark to win ​the parliamentary election ⁠on Friday, ⁠a local TV ⁠station showed, ‌as ballots ⁠were counted in a ​pivotal ‌vote that is ⁠expected ​to restore political stability in ⁠the troubled South ​Asian country. items.title: Stack discounts and save a huge $933 on Lenovo’s Legion Pro 7i RTX 5080 OLED gaming laptop today (All-time low)
items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Lenovo that gets you one of the brand’s Legion Pro 7i RTX 5080 gaming laptop for $2,037.49 shipped once you enter promo codes BUYMORELENOVO and EXTRAFIVE during checkout. Lenovo currently has this particular notebook with a 16-inch OLED panel listed for $3,720, although it’s been going for $2,970 at Best Buy where it’s currently down to $2,640 with a relatively smaller discount. You’re essentially saving as much as $933 by stacking the promo codes at Lenovo’s online store today, making this one of the best deals we’ve tracked for an RTX 5080 gaming laptop this year yet. We’ve seen the variant of this laptop with an RTX 5070 GPU go for less, but this is the lowest price we’ve tracked for this config with a Core Ultra 9 and an RTX 5080, and it makes this laptop a lot easier to recommend.

more…

You’ll find it listed for a $599 MSRP direct from the brand’s site, but can more often find it down between $448 and $429, with dips lower to $399, $377, and a one-time $349 low that lasted a few hours on November 10. Of course, for a larger battery and solar-charging capabilities, there’s also the DELTA 3 Max Portable Power Station with a 400W solar panel at $1,199 shipped, also matching its Amazon pricing. President’s Day 2026 is looming and major sale events are now live at Amazon, Best Buy, and you’ll even find some notable deals up on the Samsung site. Alongside the $400 price drops on Galaxy Z Fold 7 (no trades needed), there are also quite a number of notable price drops up for grabs across the Galaxy Tab lineup. This includes everything from the flagship S11 Ultra right through to its ultra-affordable Galaxy Tab A11+ sitting at new all-time lows from $210 shipped. Scope them all out below. 

more…
